alert.note: Alert for Dillon (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 10:21PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Bladen, southeastern Robeson, northwestern Columbus and east central Dillon Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1020 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fairmont, or 13 miles southwest of Lumberton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts between 35 and 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fairmont, Rowland, Boardman, Butters, Hestertown, Barnesville, Evergreen, Proctorville, Mcdonald and Orrum. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 2 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
